issue.title: [Java][CI] add maven wrapper to make setup process simple

<https://github.com/takari/maven-wrapper> is a good tool that helps making the setup process simpler for newcomers. 

What others say about maven wrapper?

Some good examples using maven wrapper:

<https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot>

<https://github.com/apache/camel>

<https://github.com/wgx731/dr-spring>
